storyInfo: The arts festival runs into a few obstacles, and Team Rainbow helps them out. Meanwhile, Reynell invites someone over to repair an expensive music box that belonged to his mother.

attributes.content: No. There's absolutely no way I'm letting Reynell's lackeys join our festival as long as I'm here.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: The festival is just around the corner, and I have to make sure nothing goes wrong.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: But they've already returned the medicine, and Reynell is fine with it too...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: We don't know what they could be hiding up their sleeves. Can you promise me that their intentions are only good?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Why so quiet, Tecno?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Papá, I know they're Reynell's people, the papers are full of pictures of them and Reynell together. There's no arguing that.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: But that day... when my Oripathy flared up, I fell to the ground and couldn't move. I was all alone... I thought I was done for.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Just as I was about to accept my fate, they showed up and saved me, and brought me back to the neighborhood.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I felt the same kind of despair in that fire many years ago, Papá. Until you came and saved me from the flames.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: How's that the same thing? I'm a firefighter, Tecno. Saving you is my job, and I wanted nothing more than that. But them? Are you sure they have no ulterior motives?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: I'll get someone to keep an eye on them if you're worried. Can't we just let them watch, Papá? Please?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Why are you being so stubborn, Tecno? If you vouch for them... you'll be the first one blamed if something really goes wrong.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Come on, Papá. I won't let them make any trouble.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: *sigh* Why do you always start acting so spoiled every time we argue?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Oh... please, Papá, please...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Fine. Stop batting your eyelashes, it doesn't work on me.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: But it used to...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Is that so? You didn't have such outrageously colorful hair then, you didn't drape yourself in black yet, and didn't make clinking noises with every step.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Ya estuvo suave... *sigh* What's wrong with dressing up all pretty like you did before?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Enough. Quit your pouting and get their leader to come find me for a quick talk.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Should I tell her to come here?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: No, we'll chat on the beach.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Miss Ela. Do you know why I'm here?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Probably not for the beach.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I'm sure this beach is nothing compared to the amazing views you must enjoy working for Reynell.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Hard to say. A clean beach behind an alley full of trash makes for a surprisingly pleasant view. The way the light hits is much prettier than how it shines on the neighborhood.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Nothing much we can do about that. There's too many buildings with uneven heights there.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: As for the trash... it used to be even worse. I had to bring a team here myself to clear it all, and now any aspiring litterbug faces my wrath.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: I believe anyone visiting Dossoles should always get a chance to enjoy the beach.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Am I right, Miss Ela?
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: I didn't come here to litter, Mr. Diaz. Only to enjoy the view, same as you are now.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I like how clean and quiet it is. No rowdy tourists or casino ads in sight.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: That's because the wind is so strong here, no one wants to develop the area.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: I can see it in the trees. Their leaves only grow where the wind doesn't blow.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: They're resilient, and they still thrive even though la brisa is so strong.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You mean el viento.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm not good with your local language.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Miss Ela... you say you just want to watch us, and it's not like we have anything to hide. But you should remember to keep your hands to yourself at all times.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: Tecno likes hanging out with you, and the community is happy to have your people here as well, so I'll play the bad guy here.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: If you betray her trust and hurt her feelings, I'll make sure you pay the price, even if it costs me my life.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: You care very much for Miss Tecno. Isn't she just your subordinate?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I never married or had children. Since I saved her from a fire, she has essentially become my daughter.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: That's all I have to say. I'll leave the rest for you to decide.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: What a roundabout way of showing paternal love.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Whispering) An infectious disease caused by an industrial mineral that people here can't live without. It manifests discreetly, has a variety of symptoms and so far, cannot be cured...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: (Whispering) I can't imagine what it would be like if something like oil was infectious...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Did you say something, Señor Gustave?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Oh, nothing. Just rambling to myself.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Here's the medicine and equipment you asked for. Anything you need?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I think this should be enough.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Since the loss of the doctor in charge of this neighborhood, there's been a shortage of medical help here. Everyone's glad that you've been lending a hand.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ah, that's his notebook on Oripathy over there. He was Infected many years before he eventually... *sigh*
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I can tell from just his handwriting that he was patient and meticulous in his work.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: All of us do miss him very much.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Oh, also, about the people you were looking for... I sent a Messenger to get your request out quick.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: I only met them a few times before, so I'm not too sure if those operators are the same ones you've been looking for, but... having hope is better than having nothing, right?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Certainly. I can't thank you enough.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: But... a Messenger?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Do you not have international calling here?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: International...?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Señor Ernesto, I have an appointment today, and it's now.
Oh, it's you, Ellie. This is Señor Gustave, our new doctor.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Hello, Señor Gustave. Mama made some bread for the new doctor, so this is yours.
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: Oh, please thank her for me. What kind of bread is it?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: A ker-sont.
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: Non, my little friend. It's croissant. You say it like this, 'cwuh-son'.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Weird... no one says it like that...
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: Trust me, that's the proper way.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Eh? Don't most people usually pronounce it like 'ker-sont?'
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Non, non... I can't believe this is happening.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Are you okay, doctor? You don't look so good.
attributes.name: Small Child

attributes.content: *ahem* No, I'm fine... have you been feeling unwell at all lately?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Hey, you two! That arm needs to be a bit higher, so it can connect to the shoulder later.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You got it!
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Making two puppets dance together... ambitious.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: It took us half a year from concept to making the actual thing, but it looks like our efforts haven't been in vain.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Did you plan all this?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Me? No, the original idea came from Papá.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: M-Mr. Diaz? I can't believe he'd actually...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: The year that fire happened was particularly dry. When the dance hall went up in flames, the blaze was so intense that people couldn't escape.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: It was Papá then who insisted on fighting the fire and saving us despite the orders he had. He tried his best, but couldn't save everyone...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: The fire scarred us all, and nobody wants to talk about it. We can't dance the night away like before. Not with all that pain still inside us.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: But within the last few years, people have slowly regained the desire to dance.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Except for Papá... he still feels guilty over the people he couldn't save.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: And yet he still went and proposed this...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Papá says he can't dance with everyone, but he can at least be the one that gets everyone together.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You know what, Tecno?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I was shocked when I first got here. Chaotic city planning has the place crammed with illegally built structures and jam-packed with people. I thought the whole place was a giant fire hazard.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: But there are lots of fire-fighting facilities in your streets and alleys. You've got quick evacuation routes and plans in every building.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: And then I thought, whoever runs this place is actually pretty capable.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: And I'm doubly sure of that now.
attributes.name: Iana
Tecno
attributes.content: That goes without saying...

attributes.name: Tecno
attributes.content: Hey, what's going on over there?
attributes.joined: That goes without saying... Hey, what's going on over there?

attributes.content: What happened? I think that arm stopped moving.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: What's going on?
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: This is bad, the arm got tangled with the puppet's body cables when it moved.
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Can we detach and reposition it?
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: No, it's jammed pretty tight.
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Where, exactly? I'll get someone to untangle it.
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: It's an awkward spot... between the third and fourth floors, far away from the windows.
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Use a safety harness?
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: Maybe... we'll give it a try.
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Isn't it kind of dangerous to send someone down from the eighth floor like that? That's much higher than the puppet's head.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: They don't have other options... They can't find a spot to anchor their ropes on lower floors.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Can you not move it with a remote control...? Oh, that building's outer walls don't have any good spots for easy climbing.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We handcrafted these puppets and their internal structure is real complicated... only someone super familiar with them could handle this.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Be careful...
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Almost... just a little bit more to the left—
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Oh no! The technician fell!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Phew... he's fine, he has a safety harness on.
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Can he try again?
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: I'm afraid not... that drop has his legs shaking uncontrollably.
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: No, hermano... I really can't do it, I'm afraid of heights... I, I...
attributes.name: Trembling Voice

attributes.content: But you're the one who's the most familiar with the puppets' internals... anyone else would just find it near impossible to fix...
attributes.name: Operating Crew Director

attributes.content: No... it was so scary, when I fell... I really thought I was a goner...
attributes.name: Trembling Voice

attributes.content: Wh-Why not call Tecno? She... designed it, after all...
attributes.name: Trembling Voice

attributes.content: Tecno! Tecno!
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Is he alright?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: He's fine, but he's scared out of his wits. So the boss was hoping you could try your hand at it...
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: I don't know a thing about the insides, though.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Huh? Didn't you design them?
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: I mean, I only designed what they look like, I wasn't involved in the actual production.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Then... wh-what should we do?
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: Tecno, mind letting me and Fuze have a try? We both have experience with heavy machinery.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Huh? Miss Ela, you're already done talking with Papá?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Give us a chance, Tecno.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: But didn't Papá say...?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: I can help out too, Tecno. We all have some engineering experience, so I'm sure we can do something.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: You're not afraid of heights, Señorita? That's the eighth floor... Knowing theory isn't exactly enough.
attributes.name: Operating Crew

attributes.content: I once dropped out of a twenty-story building, mister. This'll be a piece of cake.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No, you can't do that... You stay here, I'll go up myself.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Tecno?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I'm sorry, Ela. It's not that I doubt you, but I promised Papá I wouldn't let you participate, no matter what.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: But will you be able to fix it, Tecno?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I'll try my best.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Can you do me a favor, Meijer?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Of course. What is it?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Those guys over there with their eyes on me? Get them off my tail if they follow me, I need to find Fuze.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Oh, so Papá Diaz sent some backup.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: I can do it, but where are you going?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Up there. There's no way Tecno can handle the big guy.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Ela! Hey!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Damn it, where did that lady go?
attributes.name: Alert Community Guard

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Sorry, Mister, but I need your help with something!
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Alert Community Guard

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Alert Community Guard

attributes.content: You can't just sleep here.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Miłosz?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: That mechanical restorationist from Iberia is here. Are you ready to see her?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Of course, bring her in.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Señor Reynell. May I ask what it is you need me to see?
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: The music box, on the table.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Oh... the famous designer Alizja's sensational masterpiece from fifteen years ago... it is truly beautiful.
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: I can feel a sense of comforting tranquility...
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: Just look at the carving of the female figure on the lid. Serene and beautiful, her eyes full of compassion, with a faint hint of bitterness on her lips. Truly an indescribable work of beauty.
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: You can spare me the details, madam. I've spent the past several days with it, so I'm well acquainted with its form.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: The drum is badly damaged, and I'm not sure it can be fully repaired.
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: It's fine, that was my doing. I don't need it repaired.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: There is a music score in the center of the box, and I hope you can make a new drum to play that.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: A hidden compartment?
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: The man picks up the music box from the table and turns it upside-down. He lodges a fingernail into the seemingly tightly sealed bottom panel, and it opens to reveal a folded note inside.
Reynell carefully unfolds the note and places it on the table, its yellowed hue showing its age.
It is a neatly handwritten music score.
How did you know about this hidden compartment?
attributes.name: Restorationist

attributes.content: Oh, I was there when my mother worked on this box. I saw her put the note in there.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Are you sure about this? Going up to the eighth floor from here and then rappelling down?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Of course, it's the quickest way to get to our target.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Also the most dangerous way.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: You don't trust me to keep you from falling?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No, I do. But we are not welcome here.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: Such a public move will only make us a target for criticism when they decide to make us their enemies.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: You're talking more than usual.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: And you're talking less sense than usual.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: I just don't want their idea to go to waste.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why are you so concerned with these delusional artists?
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: What's wrong with delusions? It just means jaws will drop to the ground when they actually succeed in their impossibly difficult self-imposed challenges.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: When you put it that way, all our operations are just like that.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: And who would say otherwise?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You need to move fast when you land. People are after us and they'll catch up soon.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: But don't rush yourself either. I'll buy you enough time.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: ...Thanks.
attributes.name: Ela
